sen.j: 出水通（でみずどおり）は京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Demizu-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City.
Demizu-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Demizu-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 烏丸通から西へ、途中京都府庁で中断して七本松通まで。
sen.e: This street runs to west from Karasuma-dori Street to Shichihonmatsu-dori street, it stops at Kyoto Prefectural Government on the way.
The street runs westward from Karasuma-dori Street to Shichihonmatsu-dori street, and stops at the Kyoto Prefectural Government building on the way.
The street runs westward from Karasuma-dori Street to Shichihonmatsu-dori street, and stops at the Kyoto Prefectural Government building on the way.

sen.j: 市街地中心部を通り、東側では公共機関、西側では寺院が多い。
sen.e: It runs through center of the city, there are many public organizations at east side, and temples at west side.
It runs through the center of the city, with many public organizations on the east side, and temples on the west side.
It runs through the center of the city, with many public organizations on the east side, and temples on the west side.
